005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerator;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParser;
010import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatTypes;
011
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.AbstractDataTypeAdapter;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBooleanItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.EQNameFactory;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.IEnhancedQName;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import java.io.IOException;
020import java.net.URI;
021import java.util.List;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024
025/**
026 * Support for the Metaschema <a href=
027 * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#boolean">boolean</a>
028 * data type.
029 */
030public class BooleanAdapter
031    extends AbstractDataTypeAdapter<Boolean, IBooleanItem> {
032  @NonNull
033  private static final List<IEnhancedQName> NAMES = ObjectUtils.notNull(
034      List.of(
035          EQNameFactory.instance().newQName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH, "boolean")));
036
037  BooleanAdapter() {
038    super(Boolean.class, IBooleanItem.class, IBooleanItem::cast);
039  }
040
041  @Override
042  public List<IEnhancedQName> getNames() {
043    return NAMES;
044  }
045
046  @Override
047  public JsonFormatTypes getJsonRawType() {
048    return JsonFormatTypes.BOOLEAN;
049  }
050
051  @SuppressWarnings("null")
052  @Override
053  public Boolean parse(String value) {
054    return Boolean.valueOf(value);
055  }
056
057  @Override
058  public Boolean parse(JsonParser parser, URI resource) throws IOException {
059    Boolean value = parser.getBooleanValue();
060    // skip over value
061    parser.nextToken();
062    return value;
063  }
064
065  @Override
066  public void writeJsonValue(Object value, JsonGenerator generator)
067      throws IOException {
068    try {
069      generator.writeBoolean((Boolean) value);
070    } catch (ClassCastException ex) {
071      throw new IOException(ex);
072    }
073  }
074
075  @Override
076  public Boolean copy(Object obj) {
077    // the value is immutable
078    return (Boolean) obj;
079  }
080
081  @Override
082  public IBooleanItem newItem(Object value) {
083    Boolean item = toValue(value);
084    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(item);
085  }
086
087}
